recipes.name: Mighty Meat and Mushroom Skewer
recipes.description: Provides an attack buff. A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with meat.
recipes.optional: 1-3 additional pieces of meat/Razorshrooms. Can replace initial Raw Meat with Prime or Gourmet Meat.
recipes.notes: More Razorshrooms will raise the effectiveness of the attack buff. Higher quality meat will increase amount of hearts restored.

recipes.name: Hearty Seafood Rice Balls
recipes.description: Restores all hearts and adds temporary hearts. Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.
recipes.optional: Can replace Hearty Bass with Hearty Salmon or Hearty Blueshell Snail, or use a mix of two or more.
recipes.notes: More fish/snails will increase the number of temporary hearts gained.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.
recipes.optional: Can add one extra of an existing ingredient.
recipes.notes: A decent healing dish. Doesn't gain much by adding one extra ingredient.

recipes.name: Sneaky Salt-Grilled Greens
recipes.description: Provides a stealth buff. A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.
recipes.optional: Silent Princess is another greens option. Can add 1-3 extra.
recipes.notes: For a higher stealth buff, use multiple Silent Princesses.

recipes.name: Enduring Veggie Cream Soup
recipes.description: Refills and overflows stamina wheel. This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.
recipes.optional: May add meat or fish as long as they do not have a different attribute from the Endura Carrot. May add 1-2 more Endura Carrots.
recipes.notes: More Endura Carrots will increase the temporary stamina gained.

recipes.name: Energizing Honey Crepe
recipes.description: Instantly refills some of your Stamina Wheel. Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their natural sweetness and flavor.
recipes.notes: No substitutions available, all five ingredients are required to create this specific dish.

recipes.name: Tough Pumpkin Pie
recipes.description: Provides a defense buff. The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.
recipes.optional: May add another Fortified Pumpkin or other Tough ingredient. Adding a conflicting ingredient will create regular Pumpkin Pie.
recipes.notes: This will always give a low defense buff unless adding an Armored Porgy as the optional ingredient.

recipes.name: Mighty Crab Omelot with Rice
recipes.description: Provides an attack buff. The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.
recipes.notes: An additional Razorshell Crab will not increase the attack buff, and adding a different crab will remove the modifier entirely.

recipes.name: Chilly Cream of Mushroom Soup
recipes.description: Provides a heat resistance buff. This creamy mushroom-and-vegetable soup is thick and flavorful.
recipes.optional: Can add an additional Chillshroom or Cool Safflina, or a Chillfin Trout.
recipes.notes: Adding an extra Chillshroom or a Chillfin Trout will increase the heat resistance buff.

recipes.name: Spicy Sautéed Peppers
recipes.description: Provides a cold resistance buff. The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.
recipes.optional: Can add an additional 1-4 Spicy Peppers.
recipes.notes: Will always provide a low-level cold resistance buff under normal circumstances.

recipes.name: Prime Poultry Curry
recipes.description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.
recipes.optional: May add 1-2 additional Raw Bird Thighs.
recipes.notes: Adding more Raw Bird Thighs will increase the number of hearts restored.

recipes.name: Electro Seafood Meunière
recipes.description: Provides an electricity resistance. Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.
recipes.optional: May add 1-2 additional Voltfin Trouts or Voltfruits.
recipes.notes: Using 3 Voltfin Trouts will provide a high-level electricity buff that provides full immunity to electric attacks, but not lightning.
